title: Beautifully Renovated & Modern 3 Bed 1.5 Bath Harvard and Central! 9/1
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 13129916', 'Rent: $4,400 / Month', 'Beds: 3', 'Bath: 1.5', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: No Pets', 'Parking:: street parking', 'Beautifully renovated ultra modern apt close to Harvard University, Charles River and Central Square!', ' Three bedroom row house in a six unit development, each unit has one & one half baths, open plan first floor with kitchen, living & dining room.', 'The kitchens have granite counters & stainless steel appliances.', 'The baths feature tile & marble.', 'Basements are finished and make wonderful space for an office or guest area.', 'All units have washer/dryer, central air and yard space.', "Close to Trader Joe's and Whole Foods!", 'FEATURES', 'Central Air', 'Dishwasher', 'Disposal', 'Finished Basement', 'Granite Counter Tops', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Laundry in Unit', 'Modern Kitchen', 'New/Renovated Bath', 'New/Renovated Kitchen', 'Professionally managed Building', 'Stainless Steel Appliance(s)', 'Storage', 'Pictures used in our marketing may occasionally be of model units.', 'Apartment availability, features and amenities subject to variation and change.', 'Contact posting agent for the most current and accurate information available.', '- Senné']
